Table of Contents

NAME

XfwfRows

DESCRIPTION

The RowCol widget forces all its children into tightly packed rows. The children keep their preferred size, but the preferred position is ignored.

Public variables
________________________________________________

|
XfwfRows
| Name
| Class | Type | Default | XtNalignTop| XtCAlignTop| Boolean | True | | | | |____________|_____________|__________|_________

XtNalignTop
The children are packed together on as many rows as are needed, but within the row they can either be aligned on the top or on the bottom.

XtNframeType
The inherited resource frameType is given a default value of XfwfSunken, instead of the inherited default XfwfRaised. The frame width is set to a default of 2 pixels, instead of 0.

XtNframeWidth
